query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS onboarding_templates (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  task_category ENUM('documents', 'equipment', 'training', 'access', 'introduction', 'other') DEFAULT 'other',
  description TEXT,
  days_from_start INT DEFAULT 0,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2mZrnr2Ed9aCf94.e70a2c25fc99 --database PN9NN3GJE6ZdsW9AYjn6LX --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS onboarding_templates (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  task_category ENUM('documents', 'equipment', 'training', 'access', 'introduction', 'other') DEFAULT 'other',
  description TEXT,
  days_from_start INT DEFAULT 0,
  is_active BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
